data.description: Business fable marks a strategic pivot towards more narrative-driven marketing approaches

data.title: South warned of heavy rains and floods, cooler in North
data.description: Thirteen Southern provinces warned to brace for heavy downpours and flash flooding as weather deteriorates

data.title: Mill Hill International School Thailand: A Gateway to Boundless Learning Opportunities
data.description: Mill Hill International School Thailand is set to become a beacon of educational excellence in Chiang Mai, offering parents a unique option for their children

data.title: Chinese EVs, economic factors drive vehicle repossession up
data.description: Auction firm sees 8.7% increase in the number of vehicles being repossessed, with many of them pick-ups used by their owners for commercial purposes

data.title: Thailand’s biggest seizure of call scam equipment
data.description: Police conducted multiple raids in the northern province of Chiang Mai and made the country’s biggest seizure of call scam equipment installed by a Thai-Chinese gang.

data.title: Trump’s policy to drive growth of Thai property sector in 2025
data.description: Property consultant confident the expected tariffs on China will push foreign businesses to move their bases to Thailand

data.title: Cambodia identifies path to improved connectivity
data.description: Cambodia is laying the groundwork to become a regional trade hub in Southeast Asia, through strategic infrastructure investments and policy reforms.

data.title: Unclear if NS defaulter Ben Davis will join Thai team for Asean Cup in Singapore
data.description: National service (NS) defaulter Ben Davis has been called up by Thailand for the Asian Mitsubishi Electric Cup, setting up a potential showdown with the Lions and the Singapore authorities.

data.title: 50,000 tickets with 30% discount for New Year’s domestic flights
data.description: Six airlines offer 50,000 domestic flight tickets with a 30% discount to New Year travelers, according to the transport minister

data.title: Cambodian Deputy PM denies funding issues in Funan Techo Canal project
data.description: Deputy Prime Minister Sun Chanthol, chairman of the Special Commission on the Funan Techo Canal construction project, has confirmed that the project remains on track, brushing off international media reports that allege delays caused by financial issues on China’s part.

data.title: Chanthol dismisses international reports of Funan Techo Canal funding challenges
data.description: Deputy Prime Minister Sun Chanthol, chairman of the Special Commission on the Funan Techo Canal construction project, has confirmed that the project remains on track, brushing off international media reports that allege delays caused by financial issues on China’s part.

data.title: Thai Senior organizes international Sogo Malaysia Senior Championship Phuket
data.description: Thai Senior organizes the international Sogo Malaysia Senior Championship Phuket, and grants scholarships of 100,000 baht to local schools.

data.title: Probiotics Consortium to advance research and functional food industry
data.description: The Program Management Unit for Competitiveness (PMUC), under the Ministry of Higher Education, Science, Research, and Innovation, hosted an MOU signing ceremony to establish the Probiotics Research Consortium, aiming to enhance Thai research and industry competitiveness.

data.title: Rama 2 roadworks delayed 5 months
data.description: The deadline for the Rama II elevated road construction work in Samut Sakhon has been postponed from June to November of next year, according to the Expressway Authority of Thailand (Exat).

data.title: Call to register trucks before ban
data.description: The Department of Land Transport (DLT) is calling on operators of six-wheeled trucks and over to register their vehicles before City Hall implements its Low Emission Zone air pollution control programme next year.

data.title: 3 rounds of referendum 'essential'
data.description: Three rounds of referendum are a must for a proposed rewrite of the 2017 constitution, Nikorn Chamnong, secretary to the joint House-Senate House panel on the referendum bill, said.

data.title: Renowned jazzer Dan Costa to  play in Bangkok
data.description: World-class jazz pianist Dan Costa will take everyone on a journey through beautiful melodies and exciting rhythms during his piano solo concert at Sala Sudasiri Sobha, Lat Phrao Soi 41 yaek 7-2, on Sunday at 4pm.

data.title: Choi Jin-hyuk  to meet fans  in Bangkok
data.description: This Saturday, fans of Choi Jin-hyuk can meet him at "2024 Choi Jin-hyuk Fan-Con Tour In Bangkok". Organised by 247 Entertainment, the event will take place at Aksra Theatre King Power.

data.title: Trade the News: A Powerful Strategy to Try?
data.description: When it comes to investing, the common advice is to focus on long-term fundamentals and avoid getting caught up in short-term price fluctuations. However, for traders looking to seize short-term opportunities, news trading offers a dynamic and potentially profitable strategy. “Trading the news” allows traders to capitalize on price swings triggered by significant events. While this strategy presents high reward potential, it also carries notable risks. In this article, we will explore what news trading is, its advantages and disadvantages, the types of news that tend to influence markets, and tips on managing risks associated with this fast-paced approach.

data.title: Bangkok Street Performer fest returns
data.description: Public areas in the heart of the capital will be transformed into centres of music and arts for the Bangkok Street Performer Festival 2024, which will run for one day only on Saturday, from 1pm to 9pm.

data.title: SSF boosts pension, severance
data.description: Social security subscribers will receive more pension and severance pay once the way this is calculated has been revised as planned, according to the Social Security Board.

data.title: Dechapol and Supissara enter round two
data.description: Mixed doubles players Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran moved into the second round of the US$210,000 BWF Syed Modi India International 2024 in Lucknow on Wednesday.

data.title: Army says no tensions with UWSA on border
data.description: The army has dismissed media reports about tensions over a standoff between Thai military forces and United Wa State Army (UWSA) fighters in Mae Hong Son

data.title: Floods ravage four southern provinces
data.description: The four southern provinces of Songkhla, Pattani, Yala and Narathiwat are being hit by heavy rain and severe floods that have ravaged houses and forced schools and roads to close.

data.title: Singapore's Prime Minister Lawrence Wong to visit Thailand on November 28
data.description: Prime Minister Lawrence Wong will visit Bangkok on Nov 28 at the invitation of Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra.

data.title: US and China swap prisoners
data.description: WASHINGTON - The United States has brokered the release of three Americans it said had been wrongfully detained in China for many years, the White House said in a statement on Wednesday.
